title: I changed my name and now me boards profile is gone..
body:
I have change my name in "Debónair Gnar" and now my profile in boards is gone.. 

How?

replies.body: I don't think your name change removed your history, but your history shows up depending on the region your posting.  For example, I see a strong history through your [euw boards profile](http://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/player/EUW/Debónair%20Gnar).  I hope that helps!

Yes, its already fixed.. i was stressing 2 early :)

And i have 1 question, how can i mail or message Riot Games?
